title: How can a normal person read and even understand mechanical Metallurgy by George Dieter? - Quora

response.answer_text: Before starting Mechanical Metallurgy by Dieter, you can first opt to study the basics of Metallurgy by reading simple books such as Principles of Metallurgy by V.Raghavan. Materials Science and Engineering. An Introduction. William D.Callister is another book that could help. Hope this helps.
